name: intriguingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very interesting because of being unusual or mysterious: Intriguingly, people who live in the West are more likely to own a pet. The album is intriguingly titled "The Revenge Of The Goldfish". See
intriguing
More examplesFewer examples With more than 200 pieces, the show is intriguingly diverse.The all-male group is intriguingly called the Suspicious Cheese Lords.She found him intriguingly eccentric.
